description.narrative: El Gobierno de Uruguay busca fortalecer la AND ante el Fondo Verde del Clima (FVC) y sentar las bases para el desarrollo de un Marco Estratégico para la vinculación con el FVC, incluyendo la preparación de ideas de proyectos dentro del programa de país.

activity-description.narrative: Apoyo Preparatorio para el Fondo Verde

description.narrative:
Indicators are defined in the GCF Guidebook Accessing the GCF Readiness and Preparatory Support Programme (Annex III Readiness Logical Framework Methodology)
Indicator 1.1 NDA/focal point lead effective coordination mechanism Indicator 1.2: No objection procedure Indicator 1.3: Bilateral agreements on privileges and immunities between the country and the GCF Indicator1.4: Monitoring, oversight and streamlining of climate finance Indictaor 2.1: Stakeholders engaged in consultative processes Indictaor 2.2: Country programmes, including adaptation priorities Indictaor 2.3: Stakeholder consultations conducted with equal representation of women Indictaor 3.1: Candidate entities identified and nominated for accreditation Indicator 4.1: Structured dialogue between the NDA/Accredited Entities and the GCF Secretariat Indicator 4.2: Country programmes, concept notes, including on adaptation Indicator 5.1: Private sector engaged in country consultative processes Indicator 5.2: Enabling environment for crowding-in private sector investments at national, regional and international levels exist

comment.narrative:
Indicators are defined in the GCF Guidebook Accessing the GCF Readiness and Preparatory Support Programme (Annex III Readiness Logical Framework Methodology)
Indicator 1.1: 1 Indicator 1.2: 0 Indicator 1.3: 1 Indicator1.4: 0 Indictaor 2.1: 0 Indictaor 2.2: 0 Indictaor 2.3: 0 Indictaor 3.1: 1 Indicator 4.1:0 Indicator 4.2: 0 Indicator 5.1: 0 Indicator 5.2: 0

Indicators are defined in the GCF Guidebook Accessing the GCF Readiness and Preparatory Support Programme (Annex III Readiness Logical Framework Methodology) Project started in September 2017
Sub-outcome 1.1: NDA/focal point lead effective coordination mechanism Indicator target: 2 (NDA leads an effective coordination mechanism, )
Sub-outcome 1.2: No objection procedure established and implemented Indicator target: 1 (Some elements of the n objection procedure exist, however it has not been fully implemented)
Sub-outcome 1.3: Bilateral agreements on privileges and immunities between the country and the GCF executed Indicator target: 2 (Bilateral agreements between the country and GCF singed and ratified)
Sub-outcome 1.4: Monitoring, oversight and streamlining of climate finance Indicator target: 1 (Some sources of internal and external climate finance are bieng monitored, however further oversight mechanisms and streamlining of climate finance flows are required))
Sub-outcome 2.1: Stakeholders engaged in consultative processes Indicator target: 1 (Some stakeholders are being consulted on an ad-hoc basis, however a formal consultation process is not established)
Sub-outcome 2.2: Country programmes, including adaptation priorities, developed and continuously updated Indicator target: 1 (Development of country programme has started)
Sub-outcome 2.3: Stakeholder consultations conducted with equal representation of women Indicator target: 1 Gender equality measures are considered in parts of staleholders consultation processes
Sub-outcome 3.1: Candidate entities identified and nominated for accreditation Indicator target: 2 (Candidate sub-national, national or regional entities for accreditatio identified and nominated)
Sub-outcome 4.1: Structured dialogue between the NDA/Accredited Entities and the GCF Secretariat organized Indicator target: 1 (Separate ad-hoc dialogues existing between NDA/FP and some accredited entities )
Sub-outcome 4.2: Country programmes, concept notes, including on adaptation, developed that implement high-impact priorities identified in INDCs and other national strategies or plans Indicator target:1 (Initial Project concept notes developed with partial alignment to the country programme)
Sub-outcome 5.1: Private sector engaged in country consultative processes Indicator target: 1 (some private sector actors are engaged )
Sub-outcome 5.2: Enabling environment for crowding-in private sector investments at national, regional and international levels exist Indicator target: 1 Some private sector investments happening in the country

Sub-outcome 1.1: NDA/focal point lead effective coordination mechanism Indicator value: 2 (NDA leads an effective coordination mechanism, )
Sub-outcome 1.2: No objection procedure established and implemented Indicator value: 1 (Some elements of the n objection procedure exist, however it has not been fully implemented)
Sub-outcome 1.3: Bilateral agreements on privileges and immunities between the country and the GCF executed Indicator value: 2 (Bilateral agreements between the country and GCF singed and ratified)
Sub-outcome 1.4: Monitoring, oversight and streamlining of climate finance Indicator value: 1 (Some sources of internal and external climate finance are bieng monitored, however further oversight mechanisms and streamlining of climate finance flows are required))
Sub-outcome 2.1: Stakeholders engaged in consultative processes Indicator value: 1 (Some stakeholders are being consulted on an ad-hoc basis, however a formal consultation process is not established)
Sub-outcome 2.2: Country programmes, including adaptation priorities, developed and continuously updated Indicator value: 1 (Development of country programme has started)
Sub-outcome 2.3: Stakeholder consultations conducted with equal representation of women Indicator value: 1 Gender equality measures are considered in parts of staleholders consultation processes
Sub-outcome 3.1: Candidate entities identified and nominated for accreditation Indicator value: 2 (Candidate sub-national, national or regional entities for accreditatio identified and nominated)
Sub-outcome 4.1: Structured dialogue between the NDA/Accredited Entities and the GCF Secretariat organized Indicator value: 1 (Separate ad-hoc dialogues existing between NDA/FP and some accredited entities )
Sub-outcome 4.2: Country programmes, concept notes, including on adaptation, developed that implement high-impact priorities identified in INDCs and other national strategies or plans Indicator value:1 (Initial Project concept notes developed with partial alignment to the country programme)
Sub-outcome 5.1: Private sector engaged in country consultative processes Indicator value: 1 (some private sector actors are engaged )
Sub-outcome 5.2: Enabling environment for crowding-in private sector investments at national, regional and international levels exist Indicator value: 1 Some private sector investments happening in the country
